WRITING.TITLE: I think sex is so overrated
WRITING.TEXT: and it wouldnt bother me if i never had sex ever again. I mean, I just dont understand what all the fuss is about where sex is concerned. Said my wife.

WRITING.TITLE: I was standing at a urinal earlier today and next to me was a midget
WRITING.TEXT:
also having a piss. I noticed he was winking at me so I looked away, I turned and looked again and the little fcuker was winking at me like crazy!
Disturbed by this, I said: Are you gay? Do u fancy me or something?
He replied: No youre splashing in my fcuking eyes!

WRITING.TITLE: Sociologists say that social media is creating the laziest generation ever.
WRITING.TEXT: I expressed my opinion in great detail by hitting the Like button.

WRITING.TITLE: They say that laughter is the best medicine.
WRITING.TEXT: Well, I have diarrhea and it's making it worse.

WRITING.TITLE: My wife says SHE is the main breadwinner and I need to treat her like SHE is the man of the house
WRITING.TEXT: So I divorced her and took the house. (Credit The Joke Cafe https://thejokecafe.com)

WRITING.TITLE: At least my massive stroke wasnt all bad news.
WRITING.TEXT: My poker playing has improved by about 50%.
